Package engine.behaviors

Class EngineBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.behaviors.EngineBehavior
  • public abstract class EngineBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the general behavior master class inherited by each behaviors in the game
    Author:
    louis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EngineBehavior​(BehaviorType type)
      Constructor of the behavior abstract class

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activate()
      This method is used to set the behavior to active state Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it
      void addListeners​(EngineBehavior behavior)
      Add a behavior to the list of the behavior listening for change events on this behavior
      void deactivate()
      This method is used to set the behavior to inactive state Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it
      abstract boolean generateSceneEvent()
      Override this method and return true if you want to generate an adding/removing event when the behavior is added / removed to the scene
      boolean isActive()
      This method is used to know if the behavior is Activated Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it
      java.util.LinkedList<EngineBehavior> listeners()  
      java.lang.Integer parent()
      Get the parent entity id
      void setParent​(java.lang.Integer identifier)
      Set the parent entity id
      BehaviorType type()
      Get the type of the Behavior

      • generateSceneEvent

        public abstract boolean generateSceneEvent()
        Override this method and return true if you want to generate an adding/removing event when the behavior is added / removed to the scene
        Returns:
        true if an event should be generated when adding this behavior type to the scene

      • type

        public final BehaviorType type()
        Get the type of the Behavior
        Returns:
        the behavior's type

      • isActive

        public final boolean isActive()
        This method is used to know if the behavior is Activated Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it
        Returns:
        True if the behavior is active

      • activate

        public final void activate()
        This method is used to set the behavior to active state Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it

      • deactivate

        public final void deactivate()
        This method is used to set the behavior to inactive state Activation Boolean can be set for various purpose when iterating through list in system for example when you don't want to act on a specified behavior, you can deactivate it
